rules_text:
Trample
Shrine-Lurker Ogama's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
When Shrine-Lurker Ogama dies, if it was a creature, return it to the battlefield. It's an Aura enchantment with enchant land and “{2}{G}{U}{R}: Sacrifice enchanted land. If you do, this aura becomes a creature.” in addition to its other abilities.
